channel.title: Vue on Xueshan Chen
channel.description: Recent content in Vue on Xueshan Chen

item.title: Vue with Animate.css set up
item.description: Using Animate.css in Vue projects Useful links: animate.css Process install animate.css using npm npm install animate.css --save if successful, you may see: "animate.css": "^4.1.1", in the package.json» "dependencies" note: may it is not version 4.1.1 using animate in the Vue project in main.js, import it using import animated from 'animate.css' using it by Vue.use(animated) then you can use it

item.title: Set up an Electron Project with VUE
item.description: Download Resources Node.js Node.js download using node -v npm -v to check. Vue initial Vue by using the command: npm install -g @vue/cli # OR yarn global add @vue/cli using vue --version to check Create a new Vue project create vue create [vue-electorn-demo-name] run the project npm run serve Add electron Using vue-cli-plugin-electron-builder vue add electron-builder Run Project in Electron npm run eletron:serve the project will look like:

item.title: jest
item.description: Config When I follow this introduction to set up the Jest, there is some errors after running npm run test. Test suite failed to run Jest worker encountered 4 child process exceptions, exceeding retry limit at ChildProcessWorker.initialize (node_modules/jest-runner/node_modules/jest-worker/build/workers/ChildProcessWorker.js:185:21) I searched online but I can not find the reason Promise Test add return import {getUserInfo} from "../../src/api/user" test('get user by email', ()=>{ return getUserInfo({email:"1434678586@qq.

item.title: No Response After Executing `vue iu`
item.description: Problems When I was learning VUE, and I want to create a new VUE project after install VUE and npm. However, when I type in vue uithen enter, it shows noting. Solution using a command cnpm i -g @vue/cli , run it, then execute vue uiagain, then it works.
